title: Skoda India's EV push: Elroq, Enyaq, and Kodiaq facelift timelines revealed
description: Skoda India is planning an aggressive expansion over the next 12-14 months. Alongside the new Kodiaq, the brand will introduce a compact SUV, the Octavia vRS, and updates to the Kushaq and Slavia (which wonâ€™t be facelifts). However, the most significant launches will be two new electric vehicles.
